import axios from'axios';const API_BASE='http://localhost:5000/api/messages';// If running locally
export const getChats=()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE}/chats`);export const getMessagesByUser=wa_id=>axios.get(`${API_BASE}/messages/${wa_id}`);export const sendMessage=data=>axios.post(`${API_BASE}/send`,data);
